headline: The Hackett Group® Announces Winners of the 2025 Hackett Innovation Awards
summary: MIAMI, June 30, 2025--The Hackett Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: HCKT), a leading generative artificial intelligence (Gen AI) consultancy and executive advisory firm, today announced the winners of its inaugural Hackett Innovation Awards, which recognize companies that are using artificial intelligence (AI) to transform their end-to-end business process performance. These companies have successfully infused AI into a wide range of end-to-end business processes.

headline: Jim Cramer on McCormick: “Some Parts of the Food Industry Are Getting it Right”
summary: McCormick & Company, Incorporated (NYSE:MKC) is one of the top 10 S&P 500 winners of the day that Jim Cramer highlighted. Cramer mentioned the company during the episode and remarked: “Then we’ve got McCormick, the spice company. This one’s a shocker because most of the food stocks have been given up… [or] left for dead. […]
